author: getjudyherenow
title: Ninjago Rattla Minifig with card holder a must have
review: Overall a great item to own.   The packaging is super....it is like the graphics are lasered on the plastic....in other words, it is not paper glued to the clear plastic.   Rattla is displayed very nicely and the Lego pieces (88 in all) can be assembled to hold the holographic card that also comes with this set.  I hope to see all of the Ninjago minifigs packed like this because it would make for an awesome collection display.  The packaging looks so good, I don't want to open it.
